meanings.sent1: I carefully unknot the tangled shoelaces.
meanings.sent2: She used a gentle touch to unknot the ribbon.
meanings.sent3: Trying to unknot a knot with your eyes closed is quite a challenge!
meanings.sent4: Her soothing voice helped unknot the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: With a steady hand, he managed to unknot the stubborn rope.

meanings.definition: To free from entanglement or difficulty.
meanings.sent1: The kind stranger helped unknot the confused mess of wires.
meanings.sent2: After hours of hard work, they finally managed to unknot the problem.
meanings.sent3: It felt like a magic spell was cast to unknot the tricky situation.
meanings.sent4: Her wise advice helped unknot the complicated dilemma.
meanings.sent5: With patience and perseverance, they were able to unknot the challenging puzzle.
